name: ChangeApplicationSource
description:
Change the source of a job application.

Use this tool to change the source of a job application. Requires the 'candidatesWrite' permission.

parameters.name: application_source_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 'applicationId' and 'sourceId', specifying the application to update and the new source ID.
